1 is an identity element for multiplication on positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)

 1 is an identity element for multiplication on positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement: mulidpi $p |- ( A e. N. -> ( A .N 1o ) = A ) $.
